predictions.subject: GPT-5 Release Date
predictions.prediction: GPT-5 will be released before December 2024
predictions.reasoning: Based on OpenAI's release cadence and announced research milestones, GPT-5 is likely to be released in late 2024. The company has indicated continued advancement in multimodal capabilities.

predictions.subject: Bitcoin Price Target
predictions.prediction: Bitcoin will reach $100k by end of 2024
predictions.reasoning: Cyclical patterns, institutional adoption, and the upcoming halving event suggest strong upward momentum for Bitcoin. Current macroeconomic conditions favor alternative stores of value.

predictions.subject: US Remote Work Adoption
predictions.prediction: Remote work will become standard for 70% of tech companies by 2025
predictions.reasoning: Cost savings, talent acquisition advantages, and employee preference trends strongly indicate continued remote work adoption. COVID-19 shifted baseline expectations permanently.

predictions.subject: Global Temperature Increase
predictions.prediction: Global average temperature will exceed 1.5°C above pre-industrial levels by 2030
predictions.reasoning: Current warming trends, greenhouse gas concentrations, and feedback loops suggest inevitable crossing of the 1.5°C threshold within the decade. Emission reduction efforts are insufficient to prevent this outcome.
